title: Video: Cocovan – Roosevelt Hotel
content:
Stretching the CitR definition of ‘New’, this track from French producer and songwriter Cocovan was initially released mid-way through last year, however took a while to be picked up on.

Six months down the line, and she’s unveiled the video for Roosevelt Hotel, giving a little more insight into the world of Cocovan. Without wanting to press the Euro-pop assumption too heavily upon it, there’s no doubting the Robyn inspirations, yet it also draws from everyone’s favourite anti-pop princess, Grimes. Slick, addictive and most of all, catchy as hell, here’s hoping for more gems like this in the future.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
